flawed_nl_solution:
He sees the doctor 12/6=<<12/6=2>>2 times a year
So he pays 400*2=$<<400*2=800>>800 for doctor visits
The cost of the pill is 5*2=$<<5*2=10>>10 per night
But insurance covers 10*0.8=$<<10*0.8=8>>8
So he pays 10-8=$<<10-8=2>>2 per night
So he pays 2*365=$<<2*365=370>>370 a year
SSo his total cost is 800+370=$<<800+370=1170>>1170 a year

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 730, not 370. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
